User Reference¶

This reference guide is intended to go through the most important capabilities of SkewTplus package. For a further details on the full contents of each module see Developer Reference.

The User Reference has the following chapters

  • Fist-Steps
    • Sounding Data
    • Fist steps using SkewTplus
  • Profile Plotting
